name: Roasted Vegetables

ingredients.name: to 3 pounds root or dense vegetable

instructions: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Toss vegetables with oil, salt, and pepper. Roast, 30 minutes to an hour, stirring at least once or twice during roasting for even cooking and browning.
Serve with fried eggs and/or yogurt, ground black pepper and plenty of torn herbs on top.
